name: bernie hukill jr
text: So Figaro's is a "Create your own" pizza place, and let me tell ya, this Place Rocks!! The Food is Amazing!! Prices are good and if your tired of red sauce and your a Garlic Nut like myself, you owe it to yourself to order Figaro's White …More

name: Torrey Geer
text: Pizza dough tastes funny. The hand tossed pizza was not crispy.  The toppings were good but the toppings did not outweigh the diugh.

name: phoney Bologna
text: The pizza is always hot. The delivery was fast and polite. Their buffalo wings are perfect. Yeah baby!

name: Alyssa Robertson
text: It’s Christmas Eve and the service was great. The pizza was cooked perfectly and the crust was not under cooked. The pizza tasted great and I had a good experience.

name: Brittany B
text: Great pizza. I'm from Chicago and haven't found any good pizza places in Oregon since I've been here until Figaro's.

name: beowulf #1
text: I saw a delivery person drop the paper plates on the dirty sidewalk and put it back on the stack. Don't get me wrong I don't eat there any more but if you are ok with getting sick go ahead and eat there. Before I saw this I thought the food was pretty good.

name: Chanel Leum
text: I have ordered from here before and it was fine...tonight I am not going to ever again.  I ordered two things for delivery, a giant three pepperoni pizza, and regular bread sticks. An hour and a half later a medium pizza and cheesy oil …More

name: Roy L Robertson
text: Great pizza.  Especially the single slices which are available for stopping by for a quick lunch.

name: Kooper Edwards
text: Most of employees are (and were until some nice ones were fired?) awesome! Good tasting pizza, highly customizable and decently fast. Worth tipping most of the time.

name: Judi Rubert
text: The pizza is delicious and the people who work there are very efficient and nice.

name: Jared Patterson
text: Very close to home with fair prices. I love it

name: Linda Henning
text: Sent us a welcome to the neighborhood coupon , we ordered $34 worth of food. Would not deliver to our address. Said it was too far (3.4 miles) and would be an hour before pickup.Lost a potential customer.

name: Steve Huntoon
text: Awesome food fast service

name: Scott Williams
text: I ordered a simple cheese pizza. It was the best pizza I have tasted in Oregon.

name: Billy Woolstenhulme
text: There 12 topping classic is freaking awesome

name: Tristan Neil
text: Good food at reasonable prices. Fast and friendly.

name: prema Clinton
text: I will never order anything from here ever again!!! Today ordered vegetarian  pizza from this place and took it home and they put sausage in it and covered with cheese. Took it back to the place and the lady said "WE DON'T 100% QURANTEE …More

name: J P
text: Great place, have been here plenty of times. Prices are reasonable and the service is always friendly.

name: VRi Justin Marx
text: Could use some 360 pics of the inside and out to give me a clear view

name: Courtney Miller
text: I'm going to be completely honest. This was horrible. There was little black hairs in our pizza. Inside the cheese, underneath the condiments. It wasn't even one piece either. There was a lot. I will never get pizza from here again.

name: Melly sammy
text: Yesterday I order pizza and hot wings I was feeling bad all night woke up and thru up was feeling like I got run over by a bus , my bf is feeling sick also not a good experience. The only reason I put a 5 star is for u guys to see.

name: Penny Jorgensen
text: Worse taco pizza we've ever had. The meat had a spoiled after taste. Some side containers with chips, tomatoes and lettuce. Two little bags of sour cream  Never again!

name: Joni Parsons
text:
We love Figaro's Pizza! The sandwiches are amazing!
Figaro's Pizza is also very generous to our community!

name: Michelle Nelms
text: Awsome pizza and they take ebt and for $1 will even cook it for u loved it

name: Gma Offouru
text: Deliveries are on time, food is always fresh, and staff are always kind & helpful!

name: lan Regnier
text: Ok pizza. This is my go to when I don't feel like making dinner.

name: Amanda Worley
text: LOVE THE EAGLE POINT ONE

name: Debbie Brown
text: Good pizza low prices

text: He grows is good for what they are fast food pizza place however the managers very professional she's a very nice lady takes good care of her customers and Eagle Point delivers which is a big plus for me

text:
It took an hour and 35 minutes for my pizza to be delivered. (I live about a mile from the place)
Very bad service.

name: Scott Fulton
text: I am 3.9 miles away and they can't deliver?  Funny I guess my money isn't good.
